sentences.en: A 123 Systems'batteries today are used primarily in cordless power tools.
sentences.cn: A123系统公司的电池目前主要用于无线直动力工具上.

sentences.en: A cordless telephone has been installed in the house.
sentences.cn: 这房子里已安装了一部无绳电话.

sentences.en: A new channel controlled mode for the cordless telephone ( cyclic channel a half channels ) is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出一种新的无绳 电话信道 控制方式:二分之一信道组循环不 定位方式 .

sentences.en: Call the number in mobile phone contacts with digital cordless telephone through one touch.
sentences.cn: 手机电话薄通过数字无绳使用座机一键快捷呼出.

sentences.en: Can connect normal telephone, cordless telephone, facsimile machine, computer modem.
sentences.cn: 可连接普通电话, 无绳电话, 传真机, 电脑调制解调器.

sentences.en: I like to use cordless telephone.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢使用无线的电话.

sentences.en: Mobile stereo, Portable - radios, CD player, Cordless telephone, MD player, etc.
sentences.cn: 适用于手机立体声接口, 小型收音机, CD播放器, 无线电话, MD播放器等等.

sentences.en: On patch cords , if connectors do not include a flexible portion, they are termed cordless plugs.
sentences.cn: 如果接插件不包括柔韧的连接部分, 则称为无绳插头.

sentences.en: Rechargeable design, for convenient, cordless massage.
sentences.cn: 可充电设计, 可更方便快捷, 无绳按摩.

sentences.en: The cordless kettle may now be a fixture in most kitchens.
sentences.cn: 无绳电热水壶现在可能是多数厨房的固定设备。

sentences.en: The cordless telephone with caller ID is user - friendly.
sentences.cn: 无绳来电显示电话使用很方便哟.

sentences.en: The name given to a cordless mouse which operates through an infrared connection.
sentences.cn: 无绳鼠标此名称是指一种通过红外线连接的无绳鼠标.

sentences.en: The paper summerizes factors for consideration in design of ordinary telephone sets and cordless ones.
sentences.cn: 本文讨论了普通电话机及无绳电话机电路设计中遇到的一些问题.

sentences.en: The waitress approached Picone with a cordless phone.
sentences.cn: 女服务员拿着无绳电话向皮科内走来。

sentences.en: There is a laser printer and a cordless telephone on the desk.
sentences.cn: 桌子上有一台激光打印机和一部无绳电话.

words.tran_cn: 用绳、索捆扎（cord的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: （电话或电动工具）不用电线与电源相连的，无电线的，无塞绳式的
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that is cordless is not connected to its power supply by wires
